column5: Anybody got one yet? Supposedly good for heavier baits..3/8 oz or more..  http://www.cabelas.com/cabelas/en/template...&hasJS=true

I have the 100HA its a great reel for heavy or light baits. It's the sweetest baitcaster I have ever owned definetly the longest casting reel. Super smooth drag/micro click adjustment,6.3 gear ratio and the best magnetic cast control system.I'm planning on buying another one before next spring. If you pick one up you will not be disappointed.
Yep, I already got the TD Advantage 153 ST & absolutely luv it for bassin topwaters. I even use it with 1/3rd oz Little Cleo's for pier chuckin!

I bought a TD Zillion 100 HA(6.3:1) this past summer, I am very pleased with this reel, like the other poster said, smoothest drag, best cast control and super long casts, just an amazing reel, I will be buying at least one more of those.
